div.head: Rasacarita and Kalpacarita
div.p: ndah saṅ hyaṅ hayu ikaṅ ajarakna mami riṅ vvaṅri ṅvaṅriṅ va kadi kita, kunaṅ deyanta humiḍəpahumədapahumidəpa sarasanikeṅ vuvusmami, hayva kita *umavaya rasacarita, mvaṅ kalpa rakva *manavasthamanavastamanavas ta consistently separates this word in the whole text, so I will not record this hereafter..

ndya kari lvirnikaṅ rasacarita mvaṅ kalpa rakva manavastha, yar kva liṅanta ri kami, aum, nihan ta lvirnya, kady aṅganiṅ viku maṅucap kacaritanikaṅta caritanikaṅ hyaṅ devatā, kalpa pūrva bhaṭāra bhaṭārī hana ṅuni, an pakayugaṅ brahmā, viṣṇu, īśvara, mahādeva, mvaṅ kusika, garga, metri, kurusya, pātañjala, mvaṅ kagəlarani yakṣa, piśāca, pretaprata, bhūta, pitara, śiva buddha, yeka rasacarita ṅaranya, adva rakva manavastha ṅaranika.
syapa ta ri vənaṅ myaktakna ika, lena sakeṅ rakva juga ika.
nihan ta vaneh anuṅ kalpa-rasacarita, vijilnya saṅka riṅ aji, inajarakənya saṅ śeva sogata, pitu rakva patumpaṅnikaṅ bhuvana i svarta mvaṅ i ruhurta rakva.

ndya lvirnya, nihan, prativī ṅaranikaṅ bhuvana kahananta, i svarnikiṅ patala, i svarnikaṅ patala nitala, i svarnikaṅ nitala sutala, i svarnikaṅ sutala talantala, i svarnikaṅ talantala talaniṅ tala, i svarnikaṅ talaniṅ tala mahātala, i svar mahātala atyanta antapatalaartapatala, nahan lvirnikaṅ saptapatala, i svar ta rakva, kadi ta ya patapniṅ tapeytapal inələp ri vakul rakva patapnya i svar.

maṅkana patumpaṅnikaṅ bhuvana pitu i ruhurta rakva, ndya lvirnya, nihan, bhūhloka ṅaranikaṅ bhuvana kahananta, i ruhurnikaṅ muvah bhuvahloka, i ruhurnikaṅ bhuvahloka svalokasuvaḥloka, i ruhurnikaṅ svalokasuvaḥloka janalokajanahloka, i ruhurnikaṅ janaloka tapoloka, i ruhurnikaṅ tapoloka satyaloka, i ruhur satyaloka mahāloka, i ruhurnikaṅ mahāloka atyanta antaloka, nda nahan lvirnikaṅ bhuvana pitu, i ruhurta rakva, kadi ta ya patumpaṅnika tavvantəvvan valuh lvirnyanlvirnya pagantuṅan i ruhurta rakva, ya ta mataṅyan ri madhyapada ṅaranikaṅ bhuvana kahananta maṅke rakva.
